mapper.select: SELECT emp_no, e.name emp_name, lev.name emp_level, d.name emp_dept FROM employee e INNER JOIN ctlevel lev ON e.lev_no = lev.lev_no INNER JOIN department d ON e.dept_no = d.dept_no WHERE id=#{emp_id} AND pw=#{emp_pw}
SELECT emp_no, name, hire_date, lev_no , dept_no, resign_yn, last_date, loc_no , birthday, id, pw, sal, authority, email, gender , team_no, email_yn FROM employee WHERE emp_no=#{1}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatlog(chat_no, from_emp_no, to_emp_no, content, chat_date) VALUES(seq_chat_no.nextval, #{from}, #{to}, SUBSTRB(#{content},1,500), TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss'))
mapper.select: SELECT feno as "from", teno as "to", content as "content", chat_date as "timestamp" FROM ( SELECT /*+ALL_ROWS */ rownum rno, chat_no, from_emp_no feno, to_emp_no teno, content, chat_date FROM chatlog c inner join employee fe on c.from_emp_no=fe.emp_no INNER JOIN employee te on c.to_emp_no=te.emp_no WHERE (from_emp_no = #{from} AND to_emp_no=#{to}) OR (from_emp_no = #{to} AND to_emp_no=#{from}) ORDER BY chat_no desc ) ORDER BY chat_no asc
